title: prepaid cards arent working// not suprised
body: welp just got a giftcard for chrimuh, entered it a couple of times with it saying try again later. tried again later, and wala! youve tried too many times xddd riot, will you ever fix your shit?? hahahhahha

replies.body: I haven't seen any outages with the store, though I know that it can sometimes be wonky if there are tons of other players trying to run transactions at the same time. Are you still having this issue? If so, are you having this issue with an RP card and are you using the Beta Client or the Legacy Client?
